ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide

Class UserDataLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide.UserDataLoader

  • public class UserDataLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class providing access to a function which converts user data in XML format to a Participant object.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Liam de Valmency (lpdv1g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Aleksandar Botev (ab9g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Dionisio Perez-Mavrogenis (dpm3g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Kim Svensson (ks6g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • loadParticipant

        public static Participant loadParticipant(java.lang.String userData)
                                   throws InvalidUserDataException
        Constructs a Participant object from the given XML user data.
        Parameters:
        userData - The user's question/answer pairs, as XML.
        Returns:
        The Participant object, storing a map of responses.
        Throws:
        InvalidUserDataException - Contains a message with a human-readable description of the problem, giving the XML element responsible (where possible).
